name: craigslist_scrape_gallery
description: Scrape the gallery/thumbnail view of Craigslist search results with images.

steps.code: const results = []; document.querySelectorAll('.cl-search-result, .result-row, .cl-static-search-result').forEach((el,i) => { if(i>=20) return; const titleEl = el.querySelector('a.posting-title, a.result-title, a.cl-app-anchor'); const priceEl = el.querySelector('.priceinfo, .result-price'); const imgEl = el.querySelector('img'); results.push({ title: titleEl?titleEl.textContent.trim():'', url: titleEl?titleEl.href:'', price: priceEl?priceEl.textContent.trim():'', thumbnail: imgEl?imgEl.src:'' }); }); return { result_count: results.length, results, url: window.location.href }
steps.name: page_data
steps.label: Extract data
